definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: She’s tall, muscular, and uses a one-handed backhand.
sentences.chinese: 她身高馬大，肌肉健碩，經常使得單手的反手。

sentences.english: But you're much too thin and tiny for big old me to eat.
sentences.chinese: 可你瘦小纖細，而我身高馬大，還填不滿我的牙縫啊。
